TextBody:
Hello Davendra,

Thank you for your patience. Could you please let me know if prior to the movement of the DLP appliance, did you have a good connectivity between the EPP Server and the AD?

Also, I will need to know more details about this problem. Could you explain what exactly VNET is and where exactly does the EPP appliance sits in your system's architecture?

Which virtualization environment are you hosting the appliance on?

One more thing, please provide us a more in-depth explanation on what the Site-to-Site tunnel set up is so we can understand better the situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
